name: Jake & The Mysterious Cave
description:
Get ready for dangers. Jake, a clumsy miner who's trapped in a strange cave in seek of diamonds, you have to help him get out of that damn cave, which is filled with deadly spikes and more dangers. The cave has some really weird rumors going around about it, do u think you can find out the reality behind those rumors????

                                              Play, Jake & The Mysterious Cave.

The keybinds feature will be implemented soon, but for now, here are the controls:

                 Move : A/D or Right/Left Arrow Keys

                 Jump : W or Up Arrow Key

                 Dialogue : Tab Key

                 Pause : Escape Key

         Read the Controls file to see all the controls.

                                                               This is just a short demo, just to get some feedback. The game is still in development, and there's a lot of cool stuff awaiting you in the future, such as light mechanic, powerups, diamonds, new traps, enemies, save/load system, checkpoints and more. For those people who don't have graphic driver in their device, i have also provided an opengl file. Enjoy.
